item.title: How to Deploy Object Detection Models on Android with Flutter
item.description: ðŸš‘ Deployment: Where ML models go to die In this post, I will outline the basic steps to deploy ML models onto lightweight mobile devices easily, quickly and for free. tip By the end of this post, you will learn about: Leveraging Hugging Face infrastructure to host models. Deploying on any edge device using REST API. Displaying the results on a Flutter Android app. According to Gartner, more than 85% of machine learning (ML) models never made it into production.

item.title: Bringing High-Quality Image Models to Mobile: Hugging Face TIMM Meets Android & iOS
item.description: info This blog post is still a work in progress. If you require further clarifications before the contents are finalized, please get in touch with me here, on LinkedIn, or Twitter. ðŸŒŸ Motivation Meet Bob, a data scientist with a passion for computer vision. Bob had been working on a project to build a model that could identify different types of fruits, from apples to pineapples. He spent countless hours training and fine-tuning the model until it could recognize fruits with 98% accuracy.
